snippet: The Israeli effort to uncover tunnels from Gaza, which Hamas considers a strategic asset, has led to a flare-up in violence along the border in recent days.
abstract: Israeli military finds another tunnel from Gaza into Israeli territory, marking second such discovery in three weeks; disclose arrest of Hamas operative Mahmoud Atawneh, who may have helped in discovery; search for tunnels has led to exchange of fire between two sides along border.

byline.contributor: Majd Al Waheidi contributed reporting from Gaza.

lead_paragraph: The Israeli effort to uncover tunnels from Gaza, which Hamas considers a strategic asset, has led to a flare-up in violence along the border in recent days.

headline.main: Israelis Find Second Tunnel From Gaza and May Know of Others
headline.print_headline: Israelis Find Another Tunnel From Gaza
